cast.overview: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.
cast.title: Knives Out

details.biography: Paul was born in Leominster Massachusetts and is one of 6 children. His father Robert and mother Doris Aubuchon Bellefeuille were both born in Leominster but had their family roots in the Province of Quebec. Paul lives in Maine and has 3 children. Paul spent close to 30 years in the broadcasting business as a radio announcer working in NH and MA and was an original member of the New Hampshire Radio Theatre an intrepid group of radio and TV broadcasters who performed a variety of old-time and newly scripted radio shows before live audiences in the late 1990s and early 2000s.
details.name: Paul Bellefeuille
